title: Google Sheets - Scrolling Issue
content: As of today, I am unable to scroll with my mouse in google sheets. The scroll bar on the right disappears and I'm taken to the bottom of the spreadsheet and can't scroll back up. I have to use CTRL+Home and then the arrow keys to go down the rows. This appears to be only on Firefox. I tried a different browser and it worked fine.
creator: mequetell

title: Why the HELL did all of ANOTHER PERSON'S passwords show up in my account and MY passwords disappear?!
content: I have zero clue how 150+ of my mother's passwords suddenly appeared in my account. Further, why the hell many of my passwords are now GONE! My mother has not used Firefox in ages and there is ZERO reason her Google Garbage should be anywhere NEAR my Firefox account. I have been using Firefox since my early teens but I will sure as hell jump ship if there is not a damn good explanation and fix for this utter BS!!!!!
creator: NC271

title: Commbank commonwealth bank upcoming bills/ payments not opening or working
content:
Commbank commonwealth bank upcoming bills/ payments not opening or working. All other operations in the Commbank site work - just not the tabs to do with Bills/bpay/upcoming payments:

I've tried the clearing of all cache a number of times as previous suggestions and still doesn't work.

It spins the "Loading" symbol for about 20 seconds then puts the message in the image.

Not working: Bills and Upcoming payments Previous online bills Financial Toolkit

I have to go to Google Chrome to operate these tabs and they work fine...... Don't make me go back to Chrome... :D
creator: cullenmatt

title: Need Permission to Replace key.db File
content:
Hi, my computer crashed and we were able to get the old files and I have them saved (Saved Files for MZForum. The file date from the crash Feb 22 and 23 and the new ones are March 9 and afterword.

I was able to replace the Logins-JSON file and you can see the date difference in the Folder which is in the Permissions picture attached. I can't move the Key 4 file over because it is asking for Administrator access.

1 - How do I get that to move this file? 2 - The Form History SQLite is doing the same thing? 3 - Should I also replace the Logins Backup and the places.sqlite?

Thank you for you help!!

Steve
creator: steve.truels

title: Menu-pulldowns malfunction, after a while of usage, on mac Sonoma -- must re-start Firefox to re-activate !
content: Menu-pulldowns malfunction, after a while of usage, on a large 2ndary monitor, on M1-Max macOS Sonoma -- I have to shutdown, and restart Firefox to re-activate !
creator: rsblanchard

title: firefox constantly freezing on different website
content:
the question is "how can we help?" that's easy: fix your browser. I've been using firefox for decades but I just installed chrome, and I desperately DO NOT want to use chrome but firefox is unstable. It freezes and I have to open task manager to try to close it and there are dozens of firefox tasks running.

Before you ask: this is a new laptop, windows 11 is updated, all the drivers, etc are updated too. I do not use extensions.
creator: incognimaus
